CustomField.formula:
IF(
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Target'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Lead'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Prospect'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Discover'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Solve') ), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0683b000006c5eb&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T3b00000Q7tAO", "N/A", 62, 109),
IF( ROSA_Knee_Opportunity_Health_Percentage__c<= 0.50, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0683b000006c5eX&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T3b00000Q7tAJ", "Red", 62, 62), IF(ROSA_Knee_Opportunity_Health_Percentage__c> 0.50 && ROSA_Knee_Opportunity_Health_Percentage__c< 1, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0683b000006c5eR&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T3b00000Q7tA4", "Yellow", 62, 70), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0683b000006c5eg&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T3b00000Q7tAY", "Green", 62, 62) ))
)
CustomField.label: ROSA Knee Opp Health
